text: Manuel Jesus Panadero Falcon (born January 28, 1973 in Valencia) is a goalball athlete from Spain. He has a disability: he is blind and is a B1 type player. He played goalball at the 2000 Summer Paralympics. His team was third. == References == Category:Spanish goalball players Category:Living people Category:1973 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:People from Valencia Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B1
title: Manuel Jesus Panadero Falcon
